channel.title: New Orleans on Vacuum weblog from Edward Vielmetti
channel.description: Recent content in New Orleans on Vacuum weblog from Edward Vielmetti

item.title: Gustav evacuation map
item.description: People have started to evacuate New Orleans and the Gulf coast. Here's a map I've been keeping over the course of the afternoon with some information about destinations where people are ending up at. It's incomplete (of course) but gives you some idea of scope.  Nancy White has a good list of other web based Gustav resources.   Grace has some details specific to hurricane evacuation planning. View Larger Map

item.title: Warren Easton HS marching band, New Orleans LA
item.description: Here's a video of the Warren Easton HS marching band in New Orleans, LA: This is a band that was basically wiped out by Hurricane Katrina, and Bart notes their restart in 2006 after Katrina. Like a lot of people we are watching from afar for the projected path through the Gulf of Gustav to hope it isn't a repeat.  Unlike Katrina, this time around there's twitter; see the twitter stream of people talking about Gustav.
